outputs.output_descr: The project will cover product redesign and development, production line conversion, process tooling modifications, testing and performance evaluation, product trials, prototype testing, production line conversion, technical assistance and training, to convert one production line of capacity 100 units annually

project_descr: Demonstration project for conversion from HCFC-22 technology to Ammonia/CO2 technology in the manufacture of two-stage refrigeration systems for cold storage and freezing applications at Yantai Moon Group Co. Ltd.
project_title: Demonstration Project of ICR Sector-Yan Tai Moon
